End-to-End Sales
Execution Platform.

Sales professionals have a lot of responsibilities and demands on their time. Interloop provides the tools to make sales people more efficient and effective in each opportunity.

From providing easy to use pipeline management, to sales coaching that reinforces best practices and increases a rep's chance for success - Interloop is your sales solution.



Learn More

Go Beyond CRM

We apply machine learning and cognitive tools to multiple data sources to surface the underlying signals from buyers throughout a deal. This data is then given to reps when and where they need it so they can make the most of each and every interaction.

Take your sales to the next level.

Sales coaching has been proven to be the leading driver in increasing sales performance.

Interloop uses IBM Watson to pick up buying signals and provide sales professionals with the information, context, and tools to achieve higher levels of performance.
